arts.ttl: Shayne Lavery scores twice as Cambridge cruise to victory against Shrewsbury
arts.sum: The Uâ€™s scored early in both halves.

arts.ttl: Leo Castledine lifts the lid on loan spell at Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: And speaking in a recent interview with football.london, Castledine says he has already gained so much from the loan experience, which he described as a 'massive step up'. "I was playing a lot of Premier League Two football back at Chelsea, and I think my time had come where I was ready to take the next step into men's football and coming here to a place like Shrewsbury has been good for me."

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town must put Blackpool defeat behind them - Ainsworth
arts.sum: But Ainsworth says Town are making positive progress on the injury front and could welcome players back into the squad for the game. The Shrewsbury head coach has challenged his players to put their memories of Wednesday night's clash to bed.

arts.ttl: Preview: Cambridge v Shrewsbury Town - Salop must bounce back
arts.sum: He said: "With Burton winning the other night, the table changed again, but believe me, I think that there are a few teams nervous. "Another tough team," Ainsworth said about the trip to Cambridge.

arts.ttl: Preview: Cambridge United vs. Shrewsbury Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Cambridge United and Shrewsbury Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
